entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle and flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:01 AM NDT Friday 28 April 2023
